mapper.update: update attendance set ATT_OUTTIME = TO_CHAR(SYSDATE,'hh24:MI:SS') WHERE EMP_ID= #{empId} and TO_CHAR(SYSDATE, 'YYYY-MM-DD') = ATT_DATE
mapper.select: SELECT * FROM ATTENDANCE WHERE EMP_ID=#{empId} and TO_CHAR(SYSDATE, 'YYYY-MM-DD')=ATT_DATE
SELECT ATT_NO, EMP_ID, ATT_STATUS_NAME, ATT_DATE, ATT_INTIME, ATT_OUTTIME FROM ATTENDANCE JOIN ATT_STATUS USING (ATT_STATUS_NO) WHERE EMP_ID=#{empId} ORDER BY ATT_DATE
